item.description:
As we move into fall and the kundalini energy begins to settle, let’s
come together as a community to play with the energy in more subtle,
nourishing and cozy ways. One way to do this is to share and practice
tantra together, in community. Certified Tantra Educator, Adam Bauer, and I will explore this
age-old question:  “What is Tantra?”  We will offer our wisdom on
this complex subject, including our sense of the connection between
Tantra yoga and Bhakti yoga, the path of love and devotion. Through
deep study and practice, we have much to share.  We
will create a sacred space for hearts to open in connection, joy to
blossom from within and devotion to emerge with the divine.

This is a great opportunity to meet like-minded folks interested in
connecting to themselves and each other in a deep and authentic way.


Come and enjoy Tantra and Bhakti practices, including kirtan chanting (!!!!),
that will support you in being present, loving and joyful.  Together
we will  consciously create more love in the world, heal what is
needed and have  fun!

Discover how to truly experience new levels of pleasure in your life.
Beginners are warmly welcome.  Singles, couples and all sexual
orientations.

For more information about the us, please visit our
websites:   www.RobynVogel.com and  www.playingground.com/profile/adam-baba/

Sponsored by Tantra to Love www.tantratolove.com
item.name: Tantra Gathering -- What is Tantra anyway?
